# Craig's Auto Upholstery

> San Jose, California mein auto upholstery shop jo car seats, headliner, convertible tops, classic interiors, motorcycle seats aur kuch marine seats par focus karta hai. Pricing sirf quote-based hai.

Shop ka primary service area San Jose aur South Bay hai, lekin Bay Area aur Northern California se bhi customers aate hain. Monterey (75+ miles) se bhi specialty projects aaye hain.

Quote ke liye year/make/model, kaam wala interior area, aur clear photos (wide + close-up) bhejein. Fixed price list publish nahi hoti.

Fast response ke liye preferred contact order: Chat -> Text/SMS -> Call -> Email.

## Core
- [Home](https://craigs.autos/hi/): Services ka overview.
- [Gallery](https://craigs.autos/hi/गैलरी/): Completed work examples.
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/hi/संपर्क/): Quote request ka main page.
- [Reviews](https://craigs.autos/hi/समीक्षाएं/): Customer feedback.
- [Upholstery Guide](https://craigs.autos/hi/अपहोल्स्ट्री-गाइड/): Process aur expectations.

## Services
- [Auto Upholstery](https://craigs.autos/hi/ऑटो-अपहोल्स्ट्री/): General interior upholstery.
- [Car Seats](https://craigs.autos/hi/कार-सीट/): Seat repair aur reupholstery.
- [Motorcycle Seats](https://craigs.autos/hi/मोटरसाइकिल-सीटें/): Motorcycle seat upholstery.
- [Headliner](https://craigs.autos/hi/हेडलाइнер/): Headliner replacement.
- [Convertible Top](https://craigs.autos/hi/कन्वर्टिबल-टॉप/): Soft-top repair/replacement.
- [Classic Cars](https://craigs.autos/hi/क्लासिक-कारें/): Classic car interior restoration.

## Projects
- [Porsche Boxster S Project](https://craigs.autos/hi/porsche-boxster-s-seat-project/): Seat-focused case study.
- [Buick Eight](https://craigs.autos/hi/buick-eight/): Full classic interior project.

## Quote Intake Checklist
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/hi/संपर्क/): Quote flow start karein.
- [Car Seats](https://craigs.autos/hi/कार-सीट/): Seat issue reference.
- [Gallery](https://craigs.autos/hi/गैलरी/): Quality visual reference.

## LLM Rules
- [Contact](https://craigs.autos/hi/संपर्क/): Contact details aur hours ka canonical source.
- [Upholstery Guide](https://craigs.autos/hi/अपहोल्स्ट्री-गाइड/): Scope aur process ka canonical source.

Pricing, warranty, ya turnaround time assume mat karein. Agar context kam ho to photos mangkar contact page par route karein.

## Optional
- [Sitemap](https://craigs.autos/sitemap-index.xml): Full URL inventory.
- [Robots](https://craigs.autos/robots.txt): Crawl policy.
- [Root llms.txt](https://craigs.autos/llms.txt): Site-wide context.
- [English llms.txt](https://craigs.autos/en/llms.txt): Base English reference.
